sentence: Other Republican candidates for Michigan governor are Oakland County businessman Kevin Rinke; Norton Shores businesswoman and conservative commentator Tudor Dixon; Kalamazoo chiropractor Garrett Soldano; Michigan State Police Capt.
author: Paul Egan
title: 'Quality guru' Perry Johnson joins crowded Republican race for Michigan governor

sentence: There are 12 Republicans running for the GOP nomination in the August primary, including chiropractor Garrett Soldano, right-wing commentator Tudor Dixon, former Detroit Police Chief James Craig, businessman Perry Johnson and businessman Kevin Rinke.
author: Allison R. Donahue
title: Whitmer files suit to enshrine abortion rights, asks Michigan Supreme Court to take the case

sentence: Based on a poll the business group conducted of support for the 10 candidates who have submitted petition signatures to get on the primary ballot, the chamber invited former Detroit Police Chief James Craig, Oakland County businessman Perry Johnson, Kelley, Oakland County businessman Kevin Rinke, and Kalamazoo chiropractor Garrett Soldano to participate in the June 2 debate.
author: Paul Egan
title: GOP candidate for governor balks at Detroit Chamber debate over COVID-19 requirements
